usedFacts.2025-07-28: Etymology: 'Entrepreneur' comes from French 'entreprendre' meaning 'to undertake' - someone who undertakes business risks
usedFacts.2025-08-04: Word spotlight: "robot" - A machine built to carry out some complex task or group of tasks by physically moving, especially one which can be programmed.
usedFacts.2025-09-01: Word spotlight: "deadline" - A time limit in the form of a date on or before which something must be completed.
